entry.title: Been using this app for well over a year now.
entry.content: For a free app (haven't paid for any extra features) it delivers all the time. Can't deal without it.

Been using this app for well over a year now.

For a free app (haven't paid for any extra features) it delivers all the time. Can't deal without it.

entry.title: Amazing app
entry.content: Fotor is an amazing app.. So easy to use, both the desktop and mobile version. Lots of effects and the one click enhance options so easy to pick from for those beginners. I use it all the time to watermark my photography pics too, thanks. Keep up the good work 👍🏼

Amazing app

Fotor is an amazing app.. So easy to use, both the desktop and mobile version. Lots of effects and the one click enhance options so easy to pick from for those beginners. I use it all the time to watermark my photography pics too, thanks. Keep up the good work 👍🏼

entry.title: I Love It!
entry.content: As a photographer, this is the best tool for me on my phone photography for post processing! Keep up the good work!

I Love It!

As a photographer, this is the best tool for me on my phone photography for post processing! Keep up the good work!

entry.title: Newby to iPhone & Fotor
entry.content: I'm new to digital photos everything & arriving at fotor to improve my 'on the move happy snapping' is mind blowing. Being able to superimpose the where & how into meaningful collages is a great memory of experience jog. Gradually I'm finding my round the app; it's not complicated, it's just me. Every day with something new discovered in the app even my 13 years old grandson believes I'm a genius. Great App - great outcomes. Better photography.

Newby to iPhone & Fotor

I'm new to digital photos everything & arriving at fotor to improve my 'on the move happy snapping' is mind blowing. Being able to superimpose the where & how into meaningful collages is a great memory of experience jog. Gradually I'm finding my round the app; it's not complicated, it's just me. Every day with something new discovered in the app even my 13 years old grandson believes I'm a genius. Great App - great outcomes. Better photography.

entry.title: Good Variety
entry.content: An App with a good variety of options to edit photos. I like that I can add a discreet signature.

Good Variety

An App with a good variety of options to edit photos. I like that I can add a discreet signature.

entry.title: WHY?...
entry.content: I've always been a huge fan of this app, but in the latest update you've taken away the range of borders, only leaving a few ugly ones. Why would you do that? I've since started using another app instead. 👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼

WHY?...

I've always been a huge fan of this app, but in the latest update you've taken away the range of borders, only leaving a few ugly ones. Why would you do that? I've since started using another app instead.
👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼

entry.title: Hard to navigate
entry.content: Don't like this app at all, I got it because I saw an ad that there's a function to remove blemishes but written in tiny tiny letters on the bottom corner, it says it's only for the pro version. The filters look very cheap and cheesy and the app crashed twice within 10 minuets of usage.

Hard to navigate

Don't like this app at all, I got it because I saw an ad that there's a function to remove blemishes but written in tiny tiny letters on the bottom corner, it says it's only for the pro version. The filters look very cheap and cheesy and the app crashed twice within 10 minuets of usage.

entry.title: Very annoyed
entry.content: The update caused it to glitch out. Now I can't interact with the app at all, including to delete it. Pissing me off a lot

Very annoyed

The update caused it to glitch out. Now I can't interact with the app at all, including to delete it. Pissing me off a lot

entry.title: Pretty awesome
entry.content: Recently upgraded my phone to a 6+ and was keen to try a new photo editing app. This one is pretty dam good. The only thing I'd like to see added would be a blemish removal tool or a healing brush.

Pretty awesome

Recently upgraded my phone to a 6+ and was keen to try a new photo editing app. This one is pretty dam good.
The only thing I'd like to see added would be a blemish removal tool or a healing brush.

entry.title: Thank you

Thank you

entry.title: Probably the 40th photo editing app I've tried
entry.content: And the only one I've kept. I can't get over the filters, plus the blur function. Amazing ! I can't even do this good of a job with photoshop, it's that simple with this app. Thankyou :)

And the only one I've kept. I can't get over the filters, plus the blur function. Amazing ! I can't even do this good of a job with photoshop, it's that simple with this app. Thankyou :)

entry.title: Love It
entry.content: I have tried a lot of apps for photo editing and this one is perfect! I use this app just about every day and have never encountered a problem! Fantastic. I recommend this app for anyone who wants to edit images or create collages as they turn out really great!

Love It

I have tried a lot of apps for photo editing and this one is perfect! I use this app just about every day and have never encountered a problem! Fantastic. I recommend this app for anyone who wants to edit images or create collages as they turn out really great!

entry.title: great!
entry.content: very simple but powerful tool if you are looking for something you can actually put your hands on and do more than just messing up with ready made filters. give it a go.. it's free ;)

great!

very simple but powerful tool if you are looking for something you can actually put your hands on and do more than just messing up with ready made filters. give it a go.. it's free ;)

entry.title: A successful app
entry.content: I've not used your newer version and couldn't find how to get to my phone photo library.... You guys are the best photo app and I want to continue using you but I can't even find how to get assistance from a customer service person. I'd love not to change to another but unfortunately I need to know how to use the app to use it... Can you assist with this.

entry.title: Rotor App
entry.content: Having been involved in photography most of my life I was very happy when I found this app for my iPad. I love the way I can enhance and allow my creativity to come through one of my photos. I found it very easy to use and I would certainly recommend it to any other photographers or artists.

Rotor App

Having been involved in photography most of my life I was very happy when I found this app for my iPad. I love the way I can enhance and allow my creativity to come through one of my photos. I found it very easy to use and I would certainly recommend it to any other photographers or artists.
